name: nanoshooter
description: robotic tank combat multiplayer action web game

scripts.build-production: run-s clean build-styles && browserify -p tsify source/index.ts > dist/index.bundle.js && run-s lint && echo ✔ done production build
scripts.build-debug: run-s clean build-styles && browserify --debug -p tsify source/index.ts > dist/index.bundle.js && run-s lint && echo ✔ done debug build

author: Chase Moskal <chasemoskal@gmail.com>
